scripts.start: rmdir /s /q scripts && mkdir scripts && node src/index.js
scripts.build:win32: rmdir /s /q De4Lua && git clone https://github.com/ShufflePerson/De4Lua && cd De4Lua && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && npm run start
scripts.build:default: rm -rf De4Lua && git clone https://github.com/ShufflePerson/De4Lua && cd De4Lua && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && npm run start
